title: President Donald J. Trump Mobilized a Massive Federal Response Ahead of Hurricane Florence – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
September 14, 2018
To the incredible citizens of North Carolina, South Carolina and the entire East Coast … We have already begun mobilizing our assets to respond accordingly, and we are here for you!
						President Donald J. Trump					IMMEDIATE SUPPORT IN PLACE: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration put preparations in place to assist States and local governments ahead of Hurricane Florence. PROTECTING THE POWER GRID: The Trump Administration is ready to rapidly assist in restoring power after Hurricane Florence and protect nuclear power plants in the path.ON SITE SUPPORT: President Trump’s Administration is working with State, Local, and private sector partners to support response efforts following Hurricane Florence’s impact.
